Title: Aa Dinagalu

Language: Kannada

Direction: K.M. Chaitanya

Cast: Chethan Kumar, Veda Sastry, Girish Karnad, Vinaya Prasad, Sharath Lohitashwa, Ashish Vidyarthi, Atul Kulkarni

Release date: October 2007

Movie Poster:
http://www.postimg.com/image/81000/photo-80797.jpg

Aa Dinagalu is a 2007 Indian Kannada film based on the book Daadaagiriya Dinagalu  
by Agni Shridhar. The film is about the rowdyism that prevailed 
in Bengaluru during 1986.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aa_Dinagalu

Next I'm uploading the 3-in-1 DVD having Ganda Hendathi, Gaalipata, Jolly Days in 720p HQ!!
But do you want me to upload the complete single DVD which is 7.80GiB or split the three movies into three different parts each (Rip the DVD)?? each single movie size is 2.59GiB, 2.68GiB, 2.45GiB respectively. If I convert it into small size the quality gets worsen so I'm uploading it as it is in the HQ format!! For me Quality matters, always!!
(My opinion and thinking is it'll be better to upload each and single movie separately!)
hey thanks a lot for all the kannada movies that u upload and ur idea of uploadin separtely is fine , quality is very important.
